name: Medicine
description:
You have an understanding of how the human body — and to a lesser extent the vampiric body — works.

This Ability covers knowledge of medicines, ailments, first-aid procedures, and diagnosis or treatment of disease. Medicine is of great use to those Kindred with an interest in repairing, damaging, or reworking the human body.

levels.five: You are respected by the world’s medical community as a pioneer.

possessedBy: Med Students, Doctors, Lifeguards, Parents, Paramedics, Tzimisce
specialties: Organ Transplants, Emergency Care, Poison Treatments, Pathology, Pharmaceuticals, the Kindred Condition
